message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $140.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $125 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $135. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still a bit hesitant at $135. Can you meet me at $130? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
